1.1.name: wordpress/mechanic-twitter-timeline
1.1.description:
MMechanic Twitter Timeline WordPress Plugins - is a WordPress plugin offering a cool set of features like real-time twitter feed-live tweets, multiple Query/username options, auto stream, avatar display, hastags, follow button, tweet count and more. Based on twitter API itself, very simple and easy to configure.

Upload and Install WordPress Mechanic Twitter Timeline Plugins, Activate and Drag the Widgets in to your WordPress Sidebar. And this plugins will useless for a thousands of websites. If you were here, download and install it, you will like it.
